review.title: “The Best Job and Best Team I have worked for so far.”
review.pros: Pros – Great opportunities, great people, great internal service, lots of integrity, respect and trust. Stable company that believes in internal and external customer service excellence!
review.cons: Cons – The location is a few miles from the resort corridor in Las Vegas, however the safe and ample parking for employees and the lack of congested traffic near the resort makes up the difference.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – All is good!

review.title: “M Reosrt”
review.pros: Pros – Its non union. It has the ability to become a very trendy and hip spot. The employees are great to work with and so are most of the managers.
review.cons: Cons – There is lack of focus from senior management and lack of trust. There doesnt seem to be a clear vision of what they want. There are also far too many senior management with large salaries and yet they cut back on line level employees.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – You should trust your managers more and listen to their advice as they are running the outlets. Hold to your commitment of integrity.
